content:
Thank you for the encouragement and guidance! I'm excited to start my meditation journey and find a routine that works for me. I'll definitely take your advice to start with a gentle commitment and adjust as needed.

I'll also keep in mind to focus on finding a meditation style that resonates with me, and I'm looking forward to exploring both Headspace and Calm to see which one works better for me.

Thank you again for your support and guidance. I feel more confident and motivated to start my meditation practice, and I appreciate knowing that I can reach out to you if I have any questions or need further guidance.

Let's do this!
